title: Mac Client Lobby
body: Every time I join a game recently my client lags through the entire champ select... Mac client needs to be cleaned up because I'm sure  I'm not the only person being affected by this.

replies.body: You could also try turning on the low-spec mode in client settings if your Mac is having problems running it smoothly ^_^. Really quick and easy fix, but be sure to let me know if it doesn't help much. Might need to do more general troubleshooting on your system.
